name: Bookmark
0:
”Alexa, open my bookmark.”
”Alexa, ask my bookmark to save a bookmark on page 214 of "The Da Vinci Code."”
”Alexa, ask my bookmark to get my bookmark for "The Davinci Code."”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my bookmark
des: My Bookmark saves bookmarks for your favorite books. When you're putting your book down, just say, "Alexa, ask my bookmark to save a bookmark on page 214 of The Da Vinci Code." Ready to re-open that book? Say, "Alexa, ask my bookmark to get my bookmark for The Da Vinci Code." Can't remember all your bookmarks? Try saying, "Alexa, list my bookmarks."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
